## lichen_project

working on FEE lichen data w/ help from Cathi's notes. goals: make a pretty linear regression plot using ggplot w/ theme 'tufte'

```{r}
#load requirements
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(agricolae)
library(plyr)
library(lmodel2)
library(rstatix)

#load data
lichen <- FULL_coenogonium

#make ggplot for visualization
reg.lichen <-ggplot(lichen, aes(x = Substrate_Diameter, y = Surface_Area)) + 
  geom_point(size=3)+ 
  geom_smooth(method="lm",se=FALSE, color="black")+ 
  theme_tufte(base_size=20) + 
  geom_rangeframe() +
  scale_y_continuous() + 
  scale_x_continuous()+ 
  theme(axis.ticks.length=unit(-0.25, "cm"), 
        axis.text.x = element_text(margin=unit(c(0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5), "cm")),
        axis.text.y = element_text(margin=unit(c(0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5), "cm")))
reg.lichen


```

```{r}
#analysis
model <- lm(Substrate_Diameter ~ Surface_Area, data = lichen)
 
summary(model)
```
